s: Summary: Exclusive Consensus badge‑only horse‑race experience at Happy Valley with prime viewing, live music and a Beer Garden.
Topics: tokenised betting, event sponsorship, community activation, on‑site branding, hospitality.
Speakers: Consensus event team, racecourse MC, local brand ambassadors.
r: Gain high‑visibility brand exposure to elite Consensus attendees.
Network with investors and founders in a relaxed, high‑energy setting.
Leverage live data streams for real‑time tokenised wagering demos.
